meanings.definition: A person who acts in advance of expected or proper time.
meanings.sent1: The sooners always finish their work before everyone else.
meanings.sent2: The sooners arrived at the party early to help set up.
meanings.sent3: The sooners were like eager beavers, always one step ahead.
meanings.sent4: She was a sooner in the classroom, always raising her hand first.
meanings.sent5: The sooners in the group project completed their tasks well ahead of schedule.

meanings.definition: A person who settles on land before the official opening of the area for settlement.
meanings.sent1: The sooners staked their claim on the land before anyone else.
meanings.sent2: The sooners built their homes on the new land before it was officially available.
meanings.sent3: The sooners were like pioneers, forging their path before the rest.
meanings.sent4: Their actions as sooners paved the way for others to follow.
meanings.sent5: The sooners' early arrival on the land caused quite a stir among the settlers.
